actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 101-341.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 655.
Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of a Senior Executive Service of the Smithsonian Institution, and for other purposes.
short_title: Smithsonian Institution Senior Service Act of 1990

summary.text: Smithsonian Institution Senior Service Act of 1990 - Title I - Authorizes the Secretary of the Smithsonian Institution, with the approval of the Board of Regents, to establish, make appointments to, and promulgate rules for a Smithsonian Institution Senior Service. Title II - Authorizes the Director of the National Gallery of Art, with the approval of the Board of Trustees, to establish, make appointments to, and promulgate rules for a National Gallery of Art Senior Service. Title III - Authorizes the Director of the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars, with the approval of the Board of Trustees, to establish, make appointments to, and promulgate rules for a Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars Senior Service.

titles.title: Smithsonian Institution Senior Executive Service Act of 1990
